CONSOLE WARNING: line 3078: Element.createShadowRoot is deprecated and will be removed in M73, around March 2019. Please use Element.attachShadow instead. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4507242028072960 for more details.
Verifies that invalid css still parses into properties.

[expanded] 
element.style { ()
/-- overloaded --/     123: ;

[expanded] 
#inspected { (<style>…</style>)
/-- overloaded --/     before property: hey;
/-- overloaded --/     after property: hey;
/-- overloaded --/     background color: orange;
    color: black;
/-- overloaded --/     color  mistake: ;
/-- overloaded --/     multiple: properties;
/-- overloaded --/     in: a:single;
/-- overloaded --/     : :line;
/-- overloaded --/     : ;
/-- overloaded --/     foo: bar;
/-- overloaded --/     bar: foo;

[expanded] 
#inspected { (<style>…</style>)
/-- overloaded --/     color: blue;
/-- overloaded --/     a property with spaces: red;
/-- overloaded --/     --a-property-with-no-value: ;
/-- overloaded --/     content: "forgot the semicolon"
          --next-property: "next property";

[expanded] 
div { (user agent stylesheet)
    display: block;
